summary: An ordinance accepting a deed from Arthur L. Loveless, a bachelor, and O. B. Thorgrimson and Myrtle R. Thorgrimson, his wife, to the City of Seattle, executed on the 5th day of December, 1925, for an easement for a drain over and across Government Lot 3, and the shore lands adjoining, in Section 26, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W. M.
